about_the_game:
It's a thrilling survival adventure game set against the backdrop of a zombie virus outbreak and a chaotic human world. Players will take on the role of the protagonist, who must survive and enter the dungeon to evade the invasion of zombie viruses in a world full of danger and challenges, through methods such as scavenging, construction, interacting with NPCs, and fighting against rebels.

You will play the role of a survivor living in this world. You are not a hero or warrior, but an ordinary person and a trash. In this world full of zombies and chaos, you must survive through methods such as scavenging, building, interacting with NPCs, and fighting rebels. Around the dungeon, you will be living in a quarantine zone with other survivors, and you must pass strict observation tests in order to be allowed to enter a safe dungeon.



In addition to storing survival supplies and fighting bandits and rebels, you also need to deal with other NPCs, choose appropriate strategies, and unravel the plot and side lines. You are not only pursuing survival, but also seeking a glimmer of hope in this world full of danger and uncertainty, and doing your best to protect yourself and the people around you. As always, the game has multiple branches and endings, and every choice you make will determine your fate and that of others!



The survival wisdom of the garbage man and the homeless will become your most precious wealth. By flipping through garbage, opening treasure chests, catching mice, and other means, you will continuously explore this world and strive to find ways to survive. Every decision will have a significant impact on your survival, and you must choose carefully in order to ultimately survive in this world full of apocalyptic shadows.
